snippet.title: Wandering Sword - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer | gamescom 2023
snippet.description:
Wandering Sword will be available on Steam on September 15, 2023. Watch the latest trailer for Wandering Sword for another look at the beautiful world of this upcoming Chinese martial arts RPG. In Wandering Sword, you play a young swordsman caught up in a feud and nearly dies. Escaping the event puts you on the path of pursuing the highest form of martial arts and exploring the pugilistic world to become the great hero you are always destined to be.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom
